meanings.definition: To shout or call out loudly to attract attention.
meanings.sent1: The children were hullooing to their friends across the playground.
meanings.sent2: She was hullooing for help when she got lost in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The dog started hullooing at the mailman, thinking he was a new friend.
meanings.sent4: The protesters were hullooing for justice in the streets.
meanings.sent5: The coach was hullooing instructions to the players during the game.

meanings.definition: The act of shouting or calling out loudly to attract attention.
meanings.sent1: The loud hullooing of the fans could be heard from the stadium.
meanings.sent2: She heard a distant hullooing in the forest and knew someone was nearby.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected hullooing of the parrot made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The hullooing of the sirens filled the air as the ambulance rushed by.
meanings.sent5: The hullooing of the auctioneer echoed through the hall as bids went up.
